message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. After careful consideration of its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exceptional item to you for $1200000. This price reflects not only the product's quality but also the unique opportunities it presents for your business or personal use. I believe this investment will provide significant returns and enhance your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits the product offers. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
